movie.title: Bad Impulse
movie.description_intro: In the aftermath of a traumatic event, a suburban husband and father buys a cutting edge home security system, only to find that it slowly destroys that which he most wants to protect.
movie.description_full: In the aftermath of a traumatic event, a suburban husband and father buys a cutting edge home security system, only to find that it slowly destroys that which he most wants to protect.

movies.title: The Last Full Measure
movies.summary: Thirty-four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. ("Pits") is awarded the nation's highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.
movies.description_full: Thirty-four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. ("Pits") is awarded the nation's highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.
movies.synopsis: Thirty-four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. ("Pits") is awarded the nation's highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.

movies.title: School Daze
movies.summary: In the South of the United States are taking place confrontations between two groups of students who have different ideas and are not able to accept the one of the opponent.
movies.description_full: In the South of the United States are taking place confrontations between two groups of students who have different ideas and are not able to accept the one of the opponent.
movies.synopsis: In the South of the United States are taking place confrontations between two groups of students who have different ideas and are not able to accept the one of the opponent.

movies.title: My Sassy Girl
movies.summary: Based on a series of true stories posted by Ho-sik Kim on the Internet describing his relationship with his girlfriend. These were later transformed into a best-selling book and the movie follows the book closely. It describes the meeting of Kyun-woo (Cha) and an unnamed girl. Kyun-woo is shamed into assisting the girl because the other passengers mistakenly think she is his girlfriend. Once he helps her, Kyun-woo develops a deep sense of responsibility for her which enables him to tolerate (somehow) the girl's abuses.

movies.title: I Will Follow You Into the Dark
movies.title_english: I Will Follow You Into the Dark
movies.title_long: I Will Follow You Into the Dark (2012)
movies.summary: Story follows Sophia, who is severely depressed after the deaths of both her parents within six months. Convinced that the Afterlife is mere oblivion, and that this life is meaningless, she retreats within herself, only to be drawn out of her depressive funk by an unexpected romance with a man named Adam. After Adam disappears mysteriously into the depths of a haunted apartment building, Sophia vows to pursue him, even if it means walking over the threshold into the realm of death.

After Adam disappears mysteriously into the depths of a haunted apartment building, Sophia vows to pursue him, even if it means walking over the threshold into the realm of death.
